drive_name.description:
Select the provider and provide the disk name

 ![AIS logo](/static/icons/favicon-100x100.png)
drive_name.title: Disk name

token.description:
To attach a remote drive [Google Drive](https://www.google.com/drive/) to Home Assistant: 
 1. Click the link below 
 2.Log in with your disk provider 
 3. Authorize ** Home assistant **. 
 4. Return here, enter the code you received from the supplier and click **SUBMIT**. 

 ![AIS logo](/static/icons/favicon-100x100.png) [Authentication]({auth_url})
token.title: Authentication

passwd.description:
To attach a remote drive [MEGA](https://mega.nz/) to the Home Assistant: 
 1.Create an account / log in with your disk provider 
 2. Enter your username and password and then click **SUBMIT**. 

 ![AIS logo](/static/icons/favicon-100x100.png)
passwd.title: Uwierzytelnienie dysku
